articles.title: Working-level Talks of Inter-Korean Authorities Held
articles.content:
Working-level Talks of Inter-Korean Authorities Held
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Working-level talks between authorities of the north and the south of Korea for the normalization of the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) were held at the Thongil House in the north side of Panmunjom on Saturday and Sunday.
					 The talks discussed the issues of decreasing the damage to be done to the south side businesses during the rainy season and normalizing operations in the KIZ and adopted an agreement.
					
					 According to it, the north and the south will let those businessmen concerned of the south side and other personnel visit the KIZ from July 10 to check and readjust equipment to reduce the damage.
					
					 The north and the south will let the south side businessmen take finished products and raw and subsidiary materials out of the zone and carry equipment out of it according to related procedures.
					
					 The north and the south will ensure the passage of south side personnel and vehicles coming in and out of the zone, communications and their safe return and personal safety for the above-said purpose.
					
					 The north and the south will make sure that the businesses in the KIZ will restart, depending on their preparations, and decided to hold the next round of talks in the KIZ on July 10 for the normalization of operations in the zone, including the prevention of recurrence of suspension of operation.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Visits Various Industrial Establishments
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Visits Various Industrial Establishments
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju visited the Sunchon Cement Complex, the Sunchon Chemical Complex and the Sunchon Nitro-Lime Fertilizer Factory to learn about production on the spot.
					 At the Sunchon Cement Complex he acquainted himself with production there before holding a consultative meeting.
					
					 At the meeting he called for earnestly learning from the fighting spirit and working style of the soldier-builders on Masik Pass who are creating the new speed of great surge in hearty response to the order of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The meeting took measures for increasing the supply of cement to major construction sites by accelerating the modernization of the production processes, cutting down the days for overhauling the kiln and radically boosting the production.
					
					  He learned in detail about production at the chemical complex and nitro-line fertilizer factory before holding a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting underscored the need for the Cabinet and related units to supply in time raw and other materials necessary for the production of vinalon and fertilizers and for the officials and workers of relevant units to push ahead with the modernization of the equipment so that production may be kept going at a high rate.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Vice Department Director Kim Song Nam came back home on Sunday after wrapping up its visit to China.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, a Korean resident in Russia, visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Sunday on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of the President.
					 She laid a floral basket before the statues before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Publishes Many Works on Cause
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Publishes Many Works on Cause
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il published many works, making sure that the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung was given steady continuity and developing in depth the Juche-based idea and theories on accomplishing the cause of immortalizing him.
					 "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Live in the Hearts of Our People and Nation and Humankind", "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung in High Esteem as Eternal President of Our Republic" and other works reflect the idea of successfully carrying out the cause of immortalizing the leader and giving fullest play to the sense of moral obligation towards him.
					
					 The issues of making sure Kim Il Sung lies in state to perpetuity at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace (at that time) and portraying well  the portrait of the smiling President in a fresh manner are clarified in the works "The Kumsusan Memorial Palace Is the Eternal Presidential Palace of the Great Leader and the Supreme Temple of Juche" and "On Sprucing Up the Kumsusan Memorial Palace as Befitting the Supreme Temple of Juche".
					
					 "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Forever in High Esteem and Accomplish His Cause" and "Let Us Defend and Accomplish the Socialist Cause of Juche" and other works reflect the fixed will of Kim Jong Il to eternally glorify the revolutionary idea and feats of Kim Il Sung and demonstrate the dignity of Kim Il Sung's Korea for all ages.
					
					 "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung", "Some Immediate Issues Arising in Party Work" and other works underscored the need to develop the Workers' Party of Korea into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung and enhance the function and role of the party.
					
					 "Let Us Pave the Path of New Victory with Revolutionary Faith, Will and Pluck of the Great Leader" and "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" and other works clarify the idea that the loyalty to the leader is the noblest ideological and mental trait the revolutionaries should regard as their steadfast faith.
					
					 "Let Us Make This Year a Year of Revolutionary Turn in Socialist Economic Construction", "Let Us Thoroughly Implement the Line of Economic Construction in the Era of Songun Laid Down by the Party" and other works clarify the idea on bringing about a radical turn in improving the standard of people's living and building an economic power by taking Kim Il Sung's line on economic construction as unshakable guidelines and developing in depth it as required by the times.
					
					 "On Strengthening University Education as Required by Developing Revolution", "The Grand People's Study House Is a Precious Heritage of the Great Leader and a Grand Seat for All-People Study" and other works indicate important guidelines for glorifying the feats Kim Il Sung performed in building socialist national culture.
					
					 "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" and "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" clearly indicate the ways of accomplishing the cause of national reunification, the lifelong desire of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Foreign Minister for Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
S. Korean Unification Ministry Accused of Finding Fault with Just Assertions of DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, south Korean puppet minister of Foreign Affairs, was reported to have held anti-DPRK confabs with his masters U.S. and Japan during the recent  ministerial meeting of the 20th ASEAN Regional Forum. He not only cried out for "the north's dismantlement of nukes" but implored delegates of various countries to put increasing pressure upon the DPRK so that "it may meet the expectation of the international community as early as possible."
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is disgusting behavior of those lost to shame as they are keen to escalate the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The great danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula is attributable to the U.S. deep-rooted hostile policy towards the DPRK and the south Korean authorities' policy of escalating the confrontation with compatriots, pursuant to it.
					
					 Yun talked such rubbish not because he was not aware of interaction of the cause and effect of the nuclear issue on the peninsula but was prompted by the intention to echo his American master's call for the "north's dismantlement of nukes" and use it for pursuing his policy of confrontation. 
					
					 This brings to light the despicable true colors of the present ruling forces hell-bent on reliance on outside forces and sycophancy and treachery.
					
					 The hectic diplomacy conducted by traitor Yun toward participating countries during the meeting is a clear indication that the south Korean authorities do not want the nation's reconciliation and unity and the improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 If the south Korean ruling forces seek any "change" in the DPRK in collusion with outside forces and work hard to bring down its social system, far from sticking to the stand of "By our nation itself", it is hard to achieve reconciliation and cooperation and the improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 They are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can realize their ambition to escalate the confrontation with compatriots through the cooperation with outside forces.

articles.title: S. Korean Unification Ministry Accused of Finding Fault with Just Assertions of DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Unification Ministry Accused of Finding Fault with Just Assertions of DPRK
Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Recently minions of the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification urged the DPRK to "exercise restraint in its remarks", accusing it of chiding Park Geun Hye.
					 Minju Joson Sunday in a bylined commentary terms this ridiculous.
					
					 The commentary notes:
					
					 The DPRK said what it should say. It adjusted the tone of its remarks in consideration of the inter-Korean relations. Even south Korean experts on north-south relations admit this.
					
					 Nevertheless, those in the puppet ministry of Unification called for "sincere dialogue", taking issue with the just assertions made by the DPRK.
					
					 Lurking behind this is their sinister intention, the commentary notes, citing facts to prove it:
					
					 South Korea today witnesses noteworthy protest actions. Mass candle-light campaign is mounting day by day over the "Intelligence Service's interference in the presidential election" and the regime's opening to public of the minutes of the north-south summit. Personages of political, social and academic circles, university students and even the students of high schools are releasing declarations on the situation, demanding the "resignation of the government that orchestrated a coup" and the "nullification of Park Geun Hye's election".
					
					 Much upset by this strong trend of the times, the puppet group is crying out for "sincere dialogue," nonsensical talk, groundlessly finding fault with the DPRK's assertions, in a bid to evade the blame for the aborted inter-Korean dialogue, cover up its sinister intention to block the improvement of the inter-Korean ties and divert elsewhere the public criticism of it.
					
					  In a word, the puppet group is escalating confrontation with compatriots in a bid to weather its ruling crisis and stay in power, while deliberately bedeviling the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Those confrontation maniacs have faced a stern punishment by the nation without exception, the commentary notes, warning that it is as clear as a pikestaff that the present south Korean puppet ruling quarters will face the same fate as they are following in the footsteps of those traitors.

articles.title: Anniversary of July 4 Joint Statement Marked in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anniversary of July 4 Joint Statement Marked in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a meeting in Seoul on July 4, the 41st anniversary of the July 4 joint statement.
					 Attending there were members of organizations including the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty and the Solidarity for Progress.
					
					 At the meeting, the speakers said that the statement was the first promise made by the south and the north for reunification since the division.
					
					 They said that the clarification at home and abroad of the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--was of great significance in the nation's history.
					
					 The statement serves as the starting point for the south-north reconciliation, cooperation, peace and reunification, they held.
					
					 An appeal was read out.
					
					 It said that the course in which the statement was agreed upon at that time teaches truth that the south and the north can reach an agreement on reunification anytime.
					
					 The authorities should come out for dialogue with the north without any condition, it held.

articles.title: S. Korean Public Increasingly Critical of Opening of Minutes of North-South Summit
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Increasingly Critical of Opening of Minutes of North-South Summit
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Federation for Economic Justice of south Korea issued the results of opinion poll conducted on the puppet conservative ruling forces' opening of the minutes of the north-south summit.
					 More than 90 percent of the respondents opposed the opening of the minutes to public, according to the survey made of experts including scholars belonging to the society for study of politics.
					
					 A majority of respondents demanded the chief executive make an apology to the people, saying that the opening of the minutes would adversely affect the present "government."

articles.title: Friendship Meeting in Mongolia Marks Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Visit to Mongolia
articles.content:
Friendship Meeting in Mongolia Marks Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Visit to Mongolia
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting was held at the Kim Jong Il Kindergarten in Darhan Ol Province, Mongolia on July 2 to mark the 25th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's visit to Mongolia.
					 Displayed in the venue of the meeting were photos showing the undying exploits of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present there were personages of the kindergarten and the Secretariat of the Governor of the province and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Ulan Bator.
					
					 The chief of the kindergarten in a speech recollected with deep emotion the undying feats the President performed for the development of the friendship between the two countries, adding:
					
					 We will as ever deeply cherish the honor of being the kindergarten bearing the august name of the peerlessly great man and highly praise the greatness of the President, Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will also contribute to boosting the bilateral friendship by actively introducing the DPRK.

articles.title: Remembrance Meeting Held in China
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting Held in China
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held in China on Friday on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were family members of Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs and those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to China and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Its participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute.
					
					 They paid silent tribute to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They watched a Korean film dealing with the life of the President in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Speeches were made by Zhang Jinlu, daughter of Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr Zhang Weihua, Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong who was related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and the son of Feng Zhongyun.
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion the great loving care shown by the President for them, they highly praised the undying exploits he performed by dedicating himself to the liberation and independence of the country and nation, socialist construction and the cause of national reunification all his life.
					
					 Saying that he worked heart and soul for the development of the Sino-Korean friendship provided by him together with revolutionaries of the elder generation of China, they stressed that the Chinese people would always remember him as their close friend.
					
					 Noting that they are pleased with the Korean people successfully carrying out the cause of socialist construction, rallied close around the Workers' Party of Korea headed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to the last instructions of Kim Il Sung, the speakers expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve the grandiose goal of building a thriving nation without fail.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Bangladeshi Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Bangladeshi Organizations
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi organizations released a bulletin on July 1 to commemorate the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, shining august name" which said:
					
					 The President, who embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens, clearly indicated the road to be followed by the DPRK by founding the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 The revolutionaries of Korea gave him such august name as Kim Il Sung which means that he is the sun indicating the road of national resurrection and prosperity.
					
					 He liberated Korea through a 15-year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle, built a country for people and firmly protected the sovereignty and dignity of the country by inflicting upon the U.S. a heavy defeat, the first of its kind in the U.S. history, in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He also led to victory the post-war rehabilitation and construction, socialist revolution and socialist construction of different phases, thus setting an example to be followed by the world popular masses in the struggle for achieving their independence.
					
					 The Bangladeshi Group for the Study of Songun Politics carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, holding aloft the banner of independence" which said:
					
					 He performed undying feats before the era and history by holding aloft the banner of independence.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea in his early years, which clarifies that the master of revolution and construction is the popular masses and they are capable of pushing ahead with them.
					
					 In the post-war period he laid down a basic line on building socialist economy which called for giving priority to the development of heavy industry while simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture.
					
					 He worked heart and soul for the accomplishment of the cause of global independence all his life.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in Romania, Benin and Sweden from July 1 to 3 to commemorate the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, introduced the short biography of the President.   He said:
					
					 The President, who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years, founded the great Juche idea and pushed forward the revolution and construction, guided by it, and thus built an independent socialist state.
					
					 It was thanks to him that the Korean people could bring about a turning point of national resurrection. They built an invincible power which no one dared provoke while bringing about world-startling miracles and innovations under his wise leadership.
					
					 The life of the President was, indeed, totally dedicated to the country and its people.
					
					 The undying feats he performed for carrying out the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence will be always remembered by the Korean people and progressive humankind.
					
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said:
					
					 The 20th century was really a century of the President.
					
					 The President, founder of socialist Korea, is being revered by progressive mankind as eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 The vice-president of the above-said Beninese party said the exploits the President performed by resolutely protecting the sovereignty of the country in the last Korean war recorded a prominent page in the history of his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The shining victory and proud successes achieved by the DPRK under his original Songun revolutionary leadership greatly encouraged the world progressives in their struggle for independence and socialism.
					
					 Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said the great exploits performed by the President will last forever along with the eternal prosperity of socialist Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Bangladeshi Papers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Bangladeshi Papers
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi papers carried articles praising the feats of President Kim Il Sung on July 1 to mark the 19th anniversary of his demise.
					 The Weekly Industry in an article titled "The eternal sun of Juche" said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, is being revered by progressive humankind as eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea, providing a great guiding idea for the cause of independence. 
					
					 He founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerilla Army on April 25, 1932, defeated Japanese imperialism by force of arms and liberated Korea.
					
					 He led the service personnel and people of the DPRK to victory with his outstanding military idea, strategy and tactics in the Korean war ignited by the U.S., inflicting upon the U.S. a heavy defeat, the first of its kind in history.
					
					 He always adhered to the line of attaching importance to arms and military affairs in the struggle for post-war rehabilitation and construction and socialist revolution and construction. He turned the DPRK into a socialist power by abiding by the principle of independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in defence.
					
					 The Natun Bangla in an article titled "Father of the people" said Kim Il Sung was not only the leader of the country but the great father who was responsible for the life and destiny of the people.
					
					 Even in those last days of his life in 1994 he walked lanes through fields of co-op farms, devoting his all to the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					 The benevolent image of the President as father of the people will always be remembered by progressive mankind.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed by Organization of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Observed by Organization of Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association issued a bulletin on July 1 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The bulletin carried articles including "Kim Il Sung, eternal President of DPRK" and "Marshal Kim Jong Un whom all the people follow".
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "The brilliant life characterized by love for people" said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the sun of the 20th century and prominent leader of the cause of global independence, dedicated his all to the freedom and happiness of the people and victory of the cause of socialism.
					
					 He founded the immortal Juche idea, putting the status of the popular masses onto the highest level. He made the Korean people strong in the spirit of independence and led the revolution and construction to victory by trusting them and relying on them.
					
					 He loved the country more ardently than anyone else and regarded the happiness of the people as his greatest pleasure. That is why the Korean people are holding him in high esteem as eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 He indicated the road to be followed by humankind with the rays of Juche, defeated two imperialisms in one generation and built a socialist paradise centered on popular masses with ardent love for them. These exploits of the President are shining more brilliantly thanks to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The Korean people are holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as their dear father, remaining true to his leadership as he believes in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 Immensely rosy is the future of the DPRK where the leader and people are united in one mind.

articles.title: DPRK Supported by Bulgarian Paper
articles.content:
DPRK Supported by Bulgarian Paper
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The May issue of the Bulgarian paper Iskra carried a commentary titled "The forces seeking aggression and war will never escape ignominious defeat".
					 Noting tension prevails on the Korean Peninsula now due to the U.S. and its satellite forces, the commentary cited facts to prove that the U.S. prodded the UN Security Council into adopting "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and underground nuclear test for self-defence and staged large-scale nuclear war drills in succession.
					
					 Noting that these moves are aimed to weaken the DPRK economically and militarily and reduce it to a victim of imperialism in the end, the commentary said:
					
					 However, the DPRK is neither Iraq nor Libya.
					
					 The DPRK has steadily bolstered up its political, military and economic potentials to reliably protect its independence and sovereignty from the aggression of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 No sanctions can check the DPRK's peaceful use of space, development of nuclear technology and creditable conventional and nuclear forces building.
					
					 The situation proves that the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the war moves of U.S. imperialism were entirely just and it is necessary for the former to take stronger countermeasures to protect the stability on the Korean Peninsula unless the latter rolls back its hostile policy.
					
					 The struggle of the Korean people is a just cause and the DPRK will achieve a final victory in the showdown with the forces for aggression and war.

articles.title: Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Various Countries
articles.content:
Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Solidarity meetings were held in Russia and France and a film show in Nepal from June 22 to 26 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The participants of the film show watched a Korean film disclosing the crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists, provokers of the Korean war.
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works said that the Korean war was the most bloody and destructive one after the Second World War. He went on:
					
					 The matchless bravery and patriotism, absolute trust in and boundless loyalty to Supreme Commander Kim Il Sung and the army-people unity and cohesion displayed by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in the whole course of the war were the main factors of the victory in the war.
					
					 The wise leadership and unique strategy and tactics and war methods of Kim Il Sung, outstanding commander, in particular, were a decisive factor of beating back the U.S. aggression.
					
					 The U.S. moves to bring down the socialist system of the DPRK persist and they create constant tension on the Korean Peninsula and threaten the peace and stability in the region.
					
					 The peace and security on the peninsula and in the region are being firmly guaranteed as the dear respected Kim Jong Un is successfully applying the Songun idea and politics founded and developed by the preceding leaders.
					
					 The chairman of the Normandy Regional Committee of the France-Korea Friendship Association said that he was looking back with deep emotion upon the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the day of the Korean people's victory in the war. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 We denounce the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We also urge the U.S. to respond without delay to the DPRK's proposal for dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 We will further intensify the activities to support the Korean people's just cause.

articles.title: Day of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Myanmar
articles.content:
Day of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Myanmar
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Myanmar was inaugurated in Yangon on July 3 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar who is member of the parliament, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events including a meeting, friendly meeting, film show and photo exhibition in July. 
					
					 A press release adopted at the inaugural ceremony called on the world progressive people to voice firm support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving nation and achieve the reunification of the country under the outstanding leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed in Cambodia
articles.content:
Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian committee for remembering the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on July 3.
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the period from July 7 to 15 as a remembrance period and decided to widely introduce through media the glorious revolutionary life of President Kim Il Sung and his immortal exploits and the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and hold colorful political and cultural events during the period.

articles.title: Contacto de expertos entre autoridades Norte-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Contacto de expertos entre autoridades Norte-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 6 y 7 en el Pabellon Thong-il del area nortena de Phanmunjom las conversaciones de expertos entre las autoridades del Norte y el Sur de Corea para la normalizacion de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK).
					En la ocasion, quedo aprobado un acuerdo tras consultar los asuntos para reducir los danos de las empresas de la parte surena por la estacion de lluvias continuas y normalizar la ZIK.
					
					 Segun el documento, el Norte y el Sur de Corea hacen que los empresarios de la parte surena y otras personas correspondientes visiten a partir del dia 10 de julio la ZIK y realicen la revision y arreglo de las instalaciones a fin de disminuir los danos de la ZIK por la estacion de lluvias continuas.
					
					El Norte y el Sur hacen que los empresarios de la parte surena transporten los productos acabados, las materias primas, accesorios y equipos segun el orden relacionado.
					
					El Norte y el Sur aseguran el transito del personal y los vehiculos de la parte surena que entran en la ZIK y salen de ahi para la revision de las instalaciones y el transporte de materiales, la comunicacion, el regreso y la seguridad fisica de las personas surenas.
					
					El Norte y el Sur decidieron reiniciar el funcionamiento de las empresas en la ZIK segun sus preparativos y efectuar el 10 de julio en citada zona las proximas conversaciones para prevenir el cese de funcionamiento y normalizar la ZIK.
